mapper.insert: insert into project(project_name, start_date, end_date, category, participants, funding_cost, description, mentor_chk, deadline) values (#{project_name}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{category}, #{participants}, #{funding_cost}, #{description}, #{mentor_chk}, #{deadline})
mapper.delete: delete from waiting_project where project_num = #{project_num} and id = #{id}
